name: react-graphql
description: a react app implementing Apollo client and express-graphql on the server side

scripts.server: cd server && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm start
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && node app.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
